amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the Bicycle Subsidy Benefit Program of the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
